structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 232, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1980. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3071, 3183.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Annual apportionment of revenue and tax ordinance in cities of second class -- Appropriation ordinances.
